channel.title: Problem!

item.title: Problem!
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Why are you making it so complicated in the first place? You can just do:

String[] rights = { "moderator", "administrator", "owner" }; yell("The "+rights[playerRights]+", "+playerName+" has logged in.");

Read full topic

in playerrights == 0) or w/e

make the R in rights caps.

item.title: Problem!
item.dc:creator: @R_u_skeptical R_u_skeptical
item.description:
@R_u_skeptical wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:1, topic:338984”]when i put this code in my client.java i get 100 errors. i double checked the code but it seems ok to me. maybe i put it somewhere wrong can someone help me?

code:

if(playerrights == 1) { yell(@blu@ the moderator, @red@+ "playername" +,@red@ has logged in.@blu@); } if(playerrights == 2) { yell(@blu@ the administrator, @red@+ "playername" +,@red@ has logged in.@blu@); } if(playerrights == 3) { yell(@blu@ the owner, @red@+ "playername" +,@red@ has logged in.@blu@); }[/quote]

mmm. fk ill post the thing later forgot =) btw your yell is wrong

Read full topic
